definition: key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: In this age of the keyboard , some people seem to think handwriting lessons are on the way out.
sentences.chinese: 在这个键盘的年代，有人似乎认为书法课即将灭亡。

sentences.english: We need physical access to a computer with a keyboard hooked directly to it.
sentences.chinese: 需要用直接连接到计算机上的键盘来物理访问计算机。

sentences.english: And on those keys, the music that you can make is infinite.
sentences.chinese: 由键盘编织的音乐才是无限的。

sentences.english: After some furious finger tapping on the keyboard of a Personal Digital Assistant, Fei Fei leaned back in her chair.
sentences.chinese: 菲菲的手指在便携式电脑键盘上飞快地敲着。

sentences.english: Non-interactive items that are included in the control view cannot receive keyboard focus.
sentences.chinese: 控件视图中包括的非交互式项不能接收键盘焦点。

sentences.english: The door is photocell controlled by operating a keyboard.
sentences.chinese: 那扇门是通过操纵一个键盘，用光电管来控制的。

sentences.english: When keyboarding, use minimum force while striking the keys.
sentences.chinese: 敲打键盘的时候，击键时要使用最小的力气。

sentences.english: What do you think of the keyboard on this laptop?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得这种笔记本电脑的键盘怎么样？

sentences.english: The piano is a keyboard instrument with a history of over 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 钢琴是一种键盘乐器，其历史在二百年以上。

sentences.english: You type at the keyboard words that you want to encrypt.
sentences.chinese: 你从键盘上键入你想加密的单词。

sentences.english: In this scenario, a bluetooth keyboard could be connected as well.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，还可以连上一块蓝牙键盘。

sentences.english: But in the end, Yang's laughs will surely drown out those of his keyboard warrior critics.
sentences.chinese: 但是在最后，孙杨的笑容势必会盖过键盘侠们的口水。

sentences.english: Large LCD with Chinese display, automatic controlled by computer, keyboard operation.
sentences.chinese: 全中文大屏幕液晶显示，电脑自动控制，键盘操作。

sentences.english: My two hands met as if in prayer, as the thick thumbs took center stage.
sentences.chinese: 我两双手合在一起像是祈祷，厚厚的拇指在键盘中央。

sentences.english: The width of count time and display style can be set respectively by keyboard .
sentences.chinese: 计数器的计数时间宽度和显示方式由键盘设定。

sentences.english: Lu Lu pattern (six black keys and six white keys) keyboard is the outcome of the syncretism of Eastern and Western civilizations.
sentences.chinese: “律吕式键盘”是东西方文明交汇融合的产物。

definition: button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
